parameters.name: fields

parameters.description: Access token for the private data of a user's account; can be received via the authorization method; valid within a stated time period
parameters.name: access_token

parameters.description: Player ID. Maximum limit: 100.
parameters.name: account_id

list.description: Method returns partial list of players who have ever accessed in any Wargaming game. The list is filtered by name or by initial characters of user name and sorted alphabetically.

errors.description: Search parameter not specified with no account_id
Search parameter is not long enough. Allowed value depends on type parameter.
Limit of specified names in search parameter exceeded ( >100 )

parameters.description: Response field. The fields are separated with commas. Embedded fields are separated with dots. To exclude a field, use “-” in front of its name. In case the parameter is not defined, the method returns all fields. Maximum limit: 100.
parameters.name: fields

parameters.description:
Search type. Default is "startswith". Valid values:

  • "startswith" — Search by initial characters of player name. Minimum length: 3 characters. Maximum length: 24 characters. (by default)
  • "exact" — Search by exact match of player name. Case insensitive. You can enter several names, separated with commas (up to 100).
parameters.name: type

parameters.description: Player name search string. Parameter "type" defines minimum length and type of search. Using the exact search type, you can enter several names, separated with commas. Maximum length: 24.
parameters.name: search

parameters.description: Number of returned entries (fewer can be returned, but not more than 100). If the limit sent exceeds 100, a limit of None is applied (by default).
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description:
Name of the game to player search. If the parameter is not specified, search will be executed across known games. Maximum limit: 10. Valid values:

  • "wotb" — World of Tanks Blitz
  • "wot" — World of Tanks
  • "wows" — World of Warships
  • "wowp" — World of Warplanes
parameters.name: game

This parameter changes members field type. Valid values:

  • "id" — Members field will contain associative array with account_id indexing in response
parameters.name: members_key

parameters.description:
Name of the game to perform the clan search in. If the parameter is not specified, search will be executed across World of Tanks. Default is "wot". Valid values:

  • "wot" — World of Tanks (by default)
  • "wowp" — World of Warplanes
parameters.name: game

list.description:
Method searches and sorts clans by the following logic:

  • exact match of clan tag placed first
  • exact match of clan name placed second
  • name or tag matches are placed next
  • all comparisons are performed case insensitive
  • expression [wg] is converted to wg and considered as the clan tag
  • search for expression "[wg] clan" is performed by exact match of clan name and tag

Disbanded, NPC and technically frozen clans are excluded from response. Search is executed across World of Tanks and World of Warplanes.

This method will be removed. Use method Clans (World of Tanks)

fields.description: Information on clan emblems in games and on clan portal
name: emblems

list.name: Clans
